verse: वासुदेवं परित्यज्य येऽन्यं देवमुपासते । त्यकवामृतं समूढात्माभुंगते हाला हलं विशं

terms.समूढात्मा: samūḍhātmā - one whose mind is deluded

meaning: Meaning:Abandoning Vasudeva (Lord Krishna) and worshiping other gods, those whose minds are deluded indulge in the bane of giving up nectar and embracing poison, like holding a bludgeon in place of a plough.
